column4: Народ, вопрос на засыпку: "как узнать mac сервера к которому в данный момент подключен по pppoe?"
Who can answer : "How can i get mac address of  the server i just connected via pppoe?"
thank you very much, thats all i needed :)
oops not exactly, it just runs discovery and shows one of founded servers randomly
how many are available to you?
you want the MAC for all of them?
no i want the MAC of server i connected to
what exactly are you trying to do?
wrote the message, forgot to assign it to you :)
use pppoe -S to connect to the specific PPPOE server you want?
